## Trashcan class

Class for a trash can.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Trashcan extends DeleteArea implements IAutoHideable, IPositionable 
```
**Extends:** [DeleteArea](./blockly.deletearea_class.md)

**Implements:** [IAutoHideable](./blockly.iautohideable_interface.md)<!-- -->, [IPositionable](./blockly.ipositionable_interface.md)
